=======
LEGEND
=======

. = Background
# = Wall
P = Player
* = Crate
@ = Crate and Target
O = Target 

Solid = Player or Wall or Crate
=======
SOUNDS
=======
Crate Move 397107
EndLevel 72130700
EndGame 52397908

================
COLLISIONLAYERS
================

Background
Target
Player, Wall, Crate, Ghost, Temp

======
RULES     
======     

[ No Solid | <  Player | Crate ] -> [ No Solid | <  Player | > Crate  ] 


==============
WINCONDITIONS
==============

All Target on Crate
